import React from 'react' import { Box, Input, Image, Select } from '@chakra-ui/react' import SearchIcon from 'assets/svg/search.svg' import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' function Search() { const history = useHistory() const onChange = (value: string) => { history.push(`/cities/${value}`) } return (
) } export default Search
